data.text: @TeoGroot I know. Mine kept me from talking to my mom once she caused her Colin to burst at 87 and kept her from talking to me or made her pay. Wish I used this tool.  Sister destroyed my life. https://t.co/Yj0Aq84r63

@TeoGroot Sorry. If it's any consolation, I can relate. 

Friends save us. And a sweet dog or two.
